title: @Riot Bioluminescence, when's the next Story Contest?
body:
You know, where you give us a premise to write about, and then CRUELLY AND UNJUSTLY SET A FIVE HUNDRED WORD LIMIT?!

Kidding, kidding. :P

Mostly. >.>

Those are a lot of fun, and I think the last one you did was the Fall of Shurima, which I THINK was over a year ago now?

Are you not hosting those anymore? That would be sad if true :[

replies.body:
Oh hai!

Yep, the cruelty was all mine!  And you're right the last one I ran was the Shurima one - about 2 years ago (how time flies!)

{{sticker:cass-cry}} 

Two things though - I ran those when I would wake up and the whim would take me.  They were never official in any capacity - and indeed, most of the other folks at Riot never even knew I was doing it :)  Just like, one day you might wake up and think to yourself "I fancy going to the beach today!" I'd wake up and think "I feel like torturing poor creative writers with an overly harsh word limit!" or something like that.

Second thing - do you know there's an official writing competition running right now, for Riot, over at Polycount?  You've got until the Jan 31st deadline - so much longer than I'd have given ;D

http://polycount.com/discussion/192491/announcing-the-riot-creative-contest-2017/p1

There's a bunch of WIP threads for the Narrative category already - I was looking forward to reading a few over the break.  I'm not connected to the judging, so I don't feel it's a conflict of interest, and some other Rioters have already said they've found some real good ones in there.

Do you think that might scratch that itch for a while?  At least until lightning strikes again, and I wake up inspired to run another, totally unofficial, compo.
Is there any chance the deadline can be extended until after Noxus lores are out? I want to write, but I don't know basic things about my characters at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=Blood Magicks,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xAc0jAOx,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2017-12-22T20:52:29.879+0000)
>
> Is there any chance the deadline can be extended until after Noxus lores are out? I want to write, but I don't know basic things about my characters at this point.

It's not likely, no.  Think of it this way - there's always going to be new information around the corner, and you won't be marked down for not psychically knowing the future!  Every writer is doing the best with what they have, after all.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xAc0jAOx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-22T18:47:28.350+0000)
>

> 
> There's a bunch of WIP threads for the Narrative category already - I was looking forward to reading a few over the break.  I'm not connected to the judging, so I don't feel it's a conflict of interest, and some other Rioters have already said they've found some real good ones in there.
> 

Yeah there's a good few gems in there. I've had to change my Varus piece maybe 3 times now on my narrative entry. The new lore sure made my older story a doozy since it didn't fit into the lore anymore. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Wait, that’s for Riot?

Oh the pressure.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xAc0jAOx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T18:50:23.706+0000)
>
> Wait, that’s for Riot?
> 
> Oh the pressure.

Well:

> Winners will be announced and posted on Polycount, RealTime VFX, and on a Riot Art Site TBA

and

> Riot Games is the sole judge of the contest and the judgment will be final

Soooooo, good luck! 
{{sticker:galio-happy}}
For the Narrative part, can we talk about a champion but with the perspective of a character of our imagination ?

Oh god. 

Writers block don’t kill me now.
It would be an honor to have Bio read mine and tear it apart.

I had no idea about this contest. o_o

Thank you for the link! I love writing random stuff like this more than almost anything else <3
